titles.title: To grant a right of use and occupancy of a certain tract of land in Yosemite National Park to George R. Lange and Lucille F. Lange, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant named individuals a right of use and occupancy of a certain tract of land in Yosemite National Park, subject to specified conditions.
